channel.title: Why am I not getting any verification email?
channel.description:
I sent a sign up verification email and it never was received. I checked the spam folder, and nothing was there. I had to sign up TWICE. Still, no email...
Please tell me the reason, and how to fix it.

item.title: Why am I not getting any verification email?
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“Jingojohn, post:3, topic:354946”]I did, and I still wouldn’t receive it.

I have been wanting a new acc. Haha, they aren’t changing names anymore, and my name isn’t JOHN!
Haha… I am named after a mathematician/warrior… Not telling you who![/quote]

gl last time i tried to change accounts i got banned for a week or so and had to talk wit mods to have them ban my old acc instead

Read full topic
item.source: Why am I not getting any verification email?

item.title: Why am I not getting any verification email?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Try a different email. Originally, I made an account “rip3d,” but I never got a verification email so I had to make this account, rip4d using a different email.
